name: Advance wire
description:
Gameplay

connect more square for gain energy,
more energy => more wire => more connect .
bad move can cause massive chain explode.
Make better connect without explode in time.

Input
  • mouse primary click or touch (1) (new wire / add sub box)
  • mouse second click or touch (2) (delete wire / sub box)
Challenge
  • start to void, all it make only for this gamejam
  • never create this style of game before
Made with
  • Love2d + love.js (Framework + Build tool)
  • zerobrane studio (IDE)
  • Krita (Drawing)

all make by oblerion , for LÖVE Jam 2023
